text: Wiesława Kwaśniewska (born 16 June 1933) is a Polish actress. She appeared in more than twenty films and television shows between 1951 and 1984. ==Selected filmography== * How to Be Loved (1963) * Panienka z okienka (1964) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Polish film actresses Category:Actors from Łódź
title: Wiesława Kwaśniewska
